meza-ext-desc: Extension to capture all the little things meza (https://github.com/enterprisemediawiki/meza) wants
ext-meza-transferpages-conflicting-heade: ($1) pages conflicting on source and destination
ext-meza-transferpages-identical-header: ($1) pages identical on source and destination
ext-meza-transferpages-unique-header: ($1) pages only on source - good to transfer to destination
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-summ: The following jobs were added to the job queue to transfer pages from this wiki to $1. Depending on the state of your job queue this may take a while.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dele: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Deleting page from this wiki.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-redi: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Redirecting this wiki's page there.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dono: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Leaving this wiki unchanged.
ext-meza-transferpages-srcaction-all-con: For conflicting pages on the source wiki:
ext-meza-transferpages-srcaction-all-ide: For identical pages on the source wiki:
ext-meza-transferpages-srcaction-all-uni: For unique pages on the source wiki:
ext-meza-transferpages-hide-many-pages: $1 total pages found. Individual pages hidden when greater than $2 pages.
dotransfer-conflicting-uncheck-all: Do not transfer all conflicting pages
srcaction-donothingsrc-conflicting-check: Do nothing to conflicting pages on source wiki (RECOMMENDED)
srcaction-deletesrc-conflicting-check-al: Delete conflicting pages on source wiki
srcaction-redirectsrc-conflicting-check-: Replace conflicting pages on source wiki with a redirect to the destination
dotransfer-identical-check-all: Transfer all pages that already exist with identical content on destination
dotransfer-identical-uncheck-all: Do not transfer all identical pages
srcaction-donothingsrc-identical-check-a: Do nothing to identical pages on source wiki
srcaction-deletesrc-identical-check-all: Delete identical pages on source wiki
srcaction-redirectsrc-identical-check-al: Replace identical pages on source wiki with redirects to the destination wiki (RECOMMENDED)
dotransfer-unique-uncheck-all: Do not transfer all unique pages
srcaction-donothingsrc-unique-check-all: Do nothing to unique pages on source wiki
srcaction-deletesrc-unique-check-all: Delete unique pages on source wiki
srcaction-redirectsrc-unique-check-all: Replace unique pages on source wiki with redirects to the destination wiki
action-viewserverstatus: view Apache httpd and PHP info pages
